short_summary: REOI; Request for the acquisition of an Offshore Patrol Vessel through a time charter for at least a period of 6 months compented by a maximum period of 36 months Note: Phase 2 Application period's commences in Jan. 2023. ( The notice may be updated as it falls under 'procurement category' SRV. )
